section.name: Quality control step
section.p: This step allow to perform some quality controls on the output of the runs. To do this Aozan use Illumina reports, FastQC results and contamination detection results (using FastQ Screen).
This step creates a report file including the thresholds fixed for quality controls with :

ul.li: Lanes quality tests with Illumina reports
Samples quality tests with Illumina reports, FastQC, a quality control tool for high throughput sequence data. and a optional module for the contamination detection.

section.p: The next table contains the globals parameters of this step.
